sense.def:
Pripomba ali gib, ki je
ironic
, je neprimeren okoliščinam in mišljen kot šala ali žalitev.

seg.quote: It was possible that his thanks were ironic.

sense.def:
Okoliščine, ki so
ironic
, so nenavadne ali zabavne, ker so nasprotne tistemu, kar bi pričakovali.

seg.quote: It is ironic that the people who complain most loudly are the ones who do least to help.
